bike.description: Specialized M4SL Aluminum, 29er frame w/ XC geometry, fully butted w/ smooth welding, tapered headtube and seat tube, forged post mount 160mm disc dropouts, alloy replaceable der. hanger

components.description: RockShox Reba RL 29", TurnKey damping w/ Push-Loc remote lock out, Solo Air spring, tapered alloy steerer, 32mm alloy stanchions, external rebound adj., 100mm travel
Integrated 1-1/8" upper and 1-1/2" lower threadless, Campy-style, full cartridge bearings
Specialized 3D forged 6061 alloy, 4 bolt clamp, 7º rise, 31.8mm
Flat bar, 6061 double butted alloy, 700mm wide, 10º backsweep, 4º upsweep, 31.8mm
Specialized Body Geometry XCT, Kraton rubber w/ gel, closed end, 132mm, lock-on
Avid Elixir 3R, hydraulic disc, G2 CleanSweep 180mm rotor
Avid Elixir 3R, hydraulic disc, G2 CleanSweep 160mm rotor
Avid Elixir 3R, hydraulic lever, tool-less reach adjust
SRAM X7, 10-speed 2X10, 34.9mm clamp
Shimano Deore XT Shadow, 10-Speed, GS cage
Shimano Deore, 10-speed Rapidfire plus, SL type
SRAM PG 1030, 10-speed cassette, 11-36
KMC X-10, 10-speed w/ reusable Missing Link
36/22, aluminum
SRAM GXP BB for 2pc, 73mm shell
Alloy 1pc. body and cage, w/ reflectors, 9/16"
Carve SL Disc, 29", alloy double-wall, sleeve joint, 26mm, 32h
Specialized MTB disc hub, alloy, Hi Lo flange, cartridge bearings, alloy axle, QR, 32h
Specialized MTB disc hub, alloy, Hi Lo flange, cartridge bearings, steel axle, steel cassette body, QR, 32h
Stainless, 2.0mm (14g)
Specialized Ground Control, 29x2.1", Kevlar bead, 60TPI
Specialized Ground Control, 29x2.1", Kevlar bead, 60TPI
Presta valve
Specialized Body Geometry Carve SL, hollow Cr-Mo rails, 143mm width

31.8mm, forged alloy QR, brass washer
chainstay protector, reflectors, clear coat, owners manual
